Available Environments
======================

    - `Atari 2600 <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/blob/master/pytorchrl/envs/atari>`_
    - `MuJoCo <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/blob/master/pytorchrl/envs/mujoco>`_
    - `PyBullet <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/blob/master/pytorchrl/envs/pybullet>`_
    - `Obstacle Tower Unity3D <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/blob/master/pytorchrl/envs/obstacle_tower>`_
    - `Animal Olympics Unity3D <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/tree/master/pytorchrl/envs/animal_olympics>`_
    - `Crafter <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/tree/master/pytorchrl/envs/crafter>`_
    - `Causal World <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/tree/master/pytorchrl/envs/causal_world>`_
    - `Habitat <https://github.com/PyTorchRL/pytorchrl/tree/master/pytorchrl/envs/habitat>`_
